title: WTB: T3 Turkey Red HOF (Pinholes Welcome)
author: MINES_MINT

posts.post_title: WTB: T3 Turkey Red HOF (Pinholes Welcome)
posts.post_content:
Looking for T3 HOFers. Would be interested in seeing whats available. Pinholes are fine. Complete cards only please. If there are any S-81s out there feel free to share also. Thank you and stay safe.

Richard
Still on the hunt. Thank you.

BUMP: I am still looking for a few cards to finish my T3 Hall of Fame set. If you have one or more for sale, please feel free to send me a message. Raw or graded is fine. Thank you.


Also: If you were the purchaser of the recently sold set on Heritage and are looking to part it out, there were a few in that group I had my eye on. Thanks again.
